services.title: Clean, Secure Code
services.description: I am sure you hear this from many developers, although I have the pudding to prove it; in my most recent start-up, I reduced code duplication up to 90% by abstracting and librarifying code in chained micro-services, then published it as an internal NPM Package

services.title: UX
services.description: I believe that as a developer, I have the ability to enrich an end user's life, and ultimately, enable them to think and feel through enhanced and inspiring user experiences. I am assiduos about everything user-facing and I am pro-inclusion. I have no problem getting on a call with a user and finding out how I can improve their experience, as I have done in the first start-up I worked at

services.title: Cultural Appreciation
services.description: I was raised in a country renowned for it's cultural diversity,I have learned to be aware of celebrate diversity but to appreciate and celebrate it, especially after working with an international team that ranged from Nigerian to Russian

services.title: High EQ enabled Communication
services.description: I worked in customer service where there is little to no space for a low emotional quotient and verbal and written communication is pivotal. In addition to this, I have had exposure to writing Technical Documentation in both conpanies I have worked at as a developer

aboutpara: I am a 29-year-old lady who is easily excited and inspired by music, travel and the people around me. I have a steadfast love for scented candles, drumming, gardening and my two dogs. I have a witty sense of humor and I am not afraid to use it, especially to make others laugh. I also pride myself as an intuitive individual who has a knack for reading rooms, even if they are on Google hangouts!

resume.description: I am a friendly 29 year-old lady who flipped her career path on it's head after discovering the boundless wonders of code! I want to put my can-do attitude behind innovation that offers altruistic fulfilment and a steep growth-trajectory.

experiences.about: I provide support online tutoring and mentorship to students.

experiences.about: My role is mainly for back-end engineering of chained microservices which enable Secure Transaction Monitoring, at scale, in real-time. All code is integration and e2e tested, and all work is documented on Github Wiki's and demonstrated on Loom (video).
bullets: Peer reviewing code and implementation of feedback, removing code smells reported by SonarQube
Implementation of RESTful API's and their respective logic.
Publishing abstracted and librarified code to an internal npm package
Onboarding new developers and offering support and mentorship to my team
Participating and giving input on feature design meetings
Writing automative bash scripts
Current Stack: KoaJS | NestJS | TypeScript | ArangoDB
